attributes.action: Pedestrian crossing needed on St Lawrence Road, North Wingfield
attributes.additional_details: St Lawrence Road, North Wingfield between The White Hart Inn and The Gate Inn needs a pedestrian crossing (Zebra, Pelican or Puffin) to allow safe crossing of pedestrians of all ages at all times. A school crossing patrol warden during school times is not enough.This is a busy road and is extremely difficult and time consuming to cross safely during high traffic flow, it will benefit the community's safety to have a pedestrian crossing put on this part of the road by the government.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
